revised_title: Sir Charles Blagden's Contributions to the Royal Society
tldr: This article discusses the collection of original letters, manuscripts, reports, and printed papers formed by Sir Charles Blagden, a prominent member of the Royal Society. Blagden's collection contains valuable correspondence from many notable scientists and explores various scientific topics and experiments of the time. The collection is an important resource for understanding the history of the Royal Society and the development of science in the 18th century.
